definitions.definition: Any of various shrubs or (mostly) small trees , of the genus Ilex , either evergreen or deciduous , used as decoration especially at Christmas .
Any of several not closely related plant species likened to Ilex because of their prickly , evergreen foliage and/or round, bright-red berries

main_definition: Any of various shrubs or (mostly) small trees , of the genus Ilex , either evergreen or deciduous , used as decoration especially at Christmas .
secondary_definitions: ( with a qualifier ) Any of several not closely related plant species likened to Ilex because of their prickly , evergreen foliage and/or round, bright-red berries
